title: Examiner Management System
description: Built a role-based web application enabling faculty registration and admin-controlled exam assignments. Developed admin dashboard for creating and assigning practical/theory exams to faculty members. Created responsive UI using React and RESTful APIs with Express.js/Node.js backend.

title: Leave Management System
description: Built full-stack application for employee leave management with date range selection and reason tracking. Developed admin panel for leave approval/rejection with real-time status updates. Implemented leave balance calculation and leave history tracking features.

title: Amazon Clone
description: Replicated the Amazon e-commerce site using HTML and CSS.

title: Python Web Scraping using BeautifulSoup
description: Utilized Python with BeautifulSoup and Requests libraries to extract job listings from websites, allowing users to filter out job postings based on specified skills.

title: AI Domestic Violence Support System for Intel AI Hackathon
description: Developed a website for domestic violence support, integrating NLP for input processing and providing knowledge to victims.
